summary: This bill, the Creating Opportunities for New Skills Training at Rural or Underserved Colleges and Trade Schools Act of 2025, amends the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act. It authorizes grants to junior/community colleges and trade schools to expand training for residential construction careers. The grants aim to increase the supply of affordable housing. Funding includes $20 million annually from 2025-2029. Priorities are given to entities serving rural or underserved populations. The bill also details eligible uses of funds, reporting requirements, and compliance stipulations.
